description:
Esdeath has taken Tatsumi after winning the combat tournament.  And the reason being... love at first sight?!  That being said Tatsumi has not only been forced to become Esdeath’s lover but also an auxiliary member of the Jaegers.  Tatsumi and Esdeath observe as the Jaegers raid the bandits’ hideout; he witnesses how powerful the Jaegers truly are.   All the while Tatsumi tries to find an opportunity to escape and return to the Night Raid’s hideout...
Source: crunchyroll
